mapper.select:
select * from(select rownum r_num, a.* from(select * from review
pro_num=#{pro_num} order by rev_star desc)
and REV_STAR=5 and REV_STAR=4 and REV_STAR=3 and REV_STAR=2 and REV_STAR=1
order by REV_RDATE desc)
a)where r_num between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) cnt from review
pro_num=#{pro_num}
and REV_STAR=
5 4 3 2 1
order by REV_RDATE desc

select pro_num from (select r.pro_num, count(r.pro_num)from review r,product p where r.pro_num=p.pro_num and r.rev_rdate > (sysdate-30) and p.pro_category=#{cateNum} group by r.pro_num order by count(r.pro_num) desc ) where rownum between 1 and 4

select pro_num from (select r.pro_num, count(r.pro_num)from review r,product p where r.pro_num=p.pro_num and r.rev_rdate > (sysdate-30) and p.pro_category=#{cateNum} group by r.pro_num order by avg(r.pro_num) desc ) where rownum between 1 and 4

select r.rev_content, r.rev_star, r.rev_color, r.rev_period, r.rev_photo, r.rev_rdate, rpad(substr(m.mem_id, 1, 3),6,'*') mem_id, m.mem_profile from review r, member m where pro_num =#{pro_num} and r.mem_num = m.mem_num
